quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.text: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.text: The biggest risk is not taking any risk. In a world that's changing quickly, the only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks.
quotes.author: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes.text: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: To succeed in life, you need two things: ignorance and confidence.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.text: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
quotes.author: Sarah Louise Delany

quotes.text: You do not find the happy life. You make it.
quotes.author: Camilla E. Kimball

quotes.text: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: You get in life what you have the courage to ask for.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: If you want something you’ve never had, you must be willing to do something you’ve never done.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.text: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.text: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.text: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.text: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.text: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: If you can dream it, you can achieve it.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: The best way out is always through.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.text: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Act as if you are already successful and success will follow.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.text: Every man has his secret sorrows which the world knows not; and often times we call a man cold when he is only sad.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Your passion is waiting for your courage to catch up.
quotes.author: Isabelle Lafleche

quotes.text: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.text: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.text: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsleigh
